commit.message:
[#2197] Remove carousel from adopters list.

This removes the carousel from the adopters section on the homepage to
increase the stability. The logos are now simply displayed as a vertical list
with automatic adjusts to small window sizes.

Signed-off-by: Abel Buechner-Mihaljevic <abel.buechner-mihaljevic@bosch.io>
